maintaining.name: Tokodon
maintaining.description: Co-maintainer, added numerous features and fixed lots of bugs.

maintaining.name: NeoChat
maintaining.description: Newly co-maintaining. Recently added support for UnifiedPush, making it one of the first of it's kind on desktop.

maintaining.name: PlasmaTube
maintaining.description: Maintainer. Added several features such as PeerTube, Piped support and Picture-in-Picture.

maintaining.name: Plasma Desktop
maintaining.description: Currently maintaining and improving the Drawing Tablet KCM. Also bugfixing.

contributions.name: FFXIVClientStructs
contributions.description: Documenting and reverse-engineering new stuff in the hit MMO.

contributions.name: libinput
contributions.description: Added support for tablet dials, like those on XP-PEN tablets.

contributions.name: Kirigami Add-ons
contributions.description: The About KDE page, lots of bug fixes.

contributions.name: Knockout Web Client
contributions.description: Added Mastodon embeds, improved embedded content warnings.

contributions.name: KWin
contributions.description: Improving drawing tablet support, and other misc bug fixes.

contributions.name: Krita
contributions.description: Added pen tilt to the tablet tester. Small S-Pen improvements on Android.

contributions.name: Dalamud
contributions.description: Search for plugins by punchline and other bugfixes.

contributions.name: MoltenVK
contributions.description: Enable base vertex instance support in shader conversion.

contributions.name: PrismLauncher
contributions.description: The about page, icon fixes, cmark support for better Markdown rendering.

contributions.name: CATS
contributions.description: Minor bug fixes for it's baking.

contributions.name: libQuotient
contributions.description: Misc bugfixes, hoping to do more in the future!

contributions.name: libwacom
contributions.description: Added support for the XP-Pen 22R/24 Pro.

contributions.name: KItinerary
contributions.description: Added support for extracting data from several American providers, including: United Airlines, American Airlines, Brightline and Southwest.
